item.title: [PI] Edit F2P Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Lsm1107 Lsm1107
item.description:
@Lsm1107 wrote:

Hey guys,

This might come in handy to edit your F2P Quest tab. I will soon be done the members

Head into Client.java and go to

“Void Process”

Directly bellow that add this.

	getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Players:@whi@ ["+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "]", 7332); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Credits To Lsm1107!", 7333); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7334); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7336); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7383); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7339); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7338); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7340); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7346); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7341); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7342); 
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7337);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7343);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7335);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7344);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7345);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7347);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 7348);

Have fun!

Extra:
To Add buttons to the text go to the class clickingButtons xD
